title: Sacked Emmerdale star Asan N’Jie is still close to his on-screen brother
text:
Former Emmerdale actor Asan N’jie is still close to his co-star and on-screen brother Jay Kontlze.

The actor — who played Ellis Chapman in the ITV soap — took to social media yesterday to share a throwback snap of himself with co-star Jay — who portrays Ellis’ brother Billy Fletcher.

Taking to Instagram, Asan caption the picture with: ‘Still bruddas’.

He mused: ‘Jay said I looked like Bart Simpson when my hair was this long.’

He finished out the caption with: ‘Emmerdale and all the supporters changed my life, I love you guys’ before saying: ‘now go take what’s yours!!’

Jay commented under the post: ‘Remember this very well’

Asan was sacked from Emmerdale last month after an incident occurred at the TV Choice Awards, as a brawl broke out between him and Hollyoaks star Jamie Lomas.

Afterwards, the actor tweeted: ‘All the people who’ve reached out and had my back you’ll never know how much I appreciate you. I’ve learned, I’ve grown and now I’m working harder than ever to finish what I started. Keep you’re circle tight and always fall forward!

Last week, Emmerdale aired an exit for Ellis, when — after Ellis injured himself during a job for his dad Al (Michael WIldman) — Billy grew concerned about the influence Al had over Ellis, and thus arranged for his brother to move to Dubai for a PE job at mum Jessie’s (Sandra Marvin) school.
